sentence: "It comes down to focus on the district, producing results for the district, and in my opinion, Mr. Cawthorn hasn't demonstrated much in the way of results over the last 18 months," Tillis told CNN, describing why he is backing state Sen. Chuck Edwards in his primary against Cawthorn.
author: Melanie Zanona, Manu Raju and Alex Rogers
title: 'He's an embarrassment': Republicans threaten to primary Cawthorn over controversial antics
